ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup Ragu® Old World Style® Margherita Smooth Pasta Sauce
2 cups assorted sliced fresh vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini and/or blanched broccoli)

cookingTips: Spread sauce evenly to prevent soggy crust in any one spot
Arrange vegetables in a single layer so they cook evenly and don't release excess moisture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through quick assembly and baking of this vegetable pizza, and suggest ideal oven temperature and time.
